title: In Defense Of U.N. Aid In Iraq
teaser: For more on the challenges of supporting internally displaced persons in Iraq, Robert Siegel speaks with Kieran Dwyer, the spokesman for the United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs. Dwyer responds to criticisms of the U.N. agencies trying to help.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
